title: Yeptron — AI-Enabled E-Commerce Platform (In Progress)
description: Designing architecture for an AI-enabled e-commerce platform with intelligent product discovery, guided journeys, and retrieval-backed interactions.
highlights: Exploring AI-assisted search, personalized recommendations, and conversational shopping experiences
Defining data pipelines and retrieval workflows for catalogs, FAQs, and user queries
Prototyping AI-powered frontend experiences for browsing, comparison, and checkout guidance

title: Jobs4.in — AI-Assisted Screening & Resume Shortlisting (In Progress)
description: Designing AI-assisted candidate screening and recruiter-facing decision support for job platform use-cases.
highlights: Exploring semantic matching between job descriptions and candidate profiles
Defining ingestion pipelines for resumes and job posts with retrieval QA
Prototyping profile summarization and ranking views for recruiters

title: Private AI Inference Platform on Cloud VM (In Progress)
description: Designing a private cloud VM-based AI inference platform with controlled access and secure API abstraction.
highlights: Architecting backend API layers to protect underlying inference endpoints
Exploring authN/authZ and request routing patterns for controlled consumption
Experimenting with observability and rate-limiting for reliable service usage

title: AI-Enabled Mobile OS & Smart Dialer (R&D Concept)
description: Concept R&D for an AI-first mobile operating system with intelligent dialer and real-time communication intelligence.
highlights: Designing intelligent dial pad behavior with real-time voice translation
Researching AI-assisted call handling, summarization, and automated responses
Exploring on-device + cloud architectures for low-latency privacy-aware experiences
